file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-24-00-06 - PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHING SYSTEM - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHING SYSTEM - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection on the portable fire extinguishers. B. Figure 601 shows the locations of the portable fire extinguishers in the passenger cabin and cockpit. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - ALL 26-24-00-200-802-A ♦ WEIGHT INSPECTION PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - VIS- ALL 26-24-00-200-803-A ♦ UAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-24-00 Page 1 of 4 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-24-00-200-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - WEIGHT INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do the check of the portable fire extinguishers for the correct weight. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit/Passenger cabin H. Inspect Portable Fire Extinguishing Bottle for Weight (Figure 601) SUBTASK 280-002-A (1) Weigh the fire extinguisher bottles. Refer to the placard attached to the bottles. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-802-A/600 26-24-00 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-24-00-200-803-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the portable fire extinguishers for integrity and general condition. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit/Passenger cabin H. Visually Check Portable Fire Extinguishers (Figure 601) SUBTASK 211-002-A (1) Do a visual inspection of the portable fire extinguishers: • Inspect the extinguisher for exterior damage and corrosion. • Inspect the nozzle or hose, as applicable, for obstructions. • Inspect the pull-out and pull-tight seal for damage and correct installation. • If applicable, inspect the pressure gauge. Make sure the indicator is in the green section. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-803-A/600 26-24-00 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
